Name: Acid Puzzle
About the game: Acid Puzzle is a minimalistic puzzle game. As an experienced fitter, you are laying pipes into joints to pave the way for toxic waste from the upper level to the lower. This task you will have at each level. Solving puzzles with the fewest moves and the most difficulty will give you more points. At maximum complexity, pipe connections are especially prone to failure. Easy gameplay for the whole family. Enjoy your game.
